actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to take actions to prevent the inadvertent introduction of brown tree snakes from Guam to Hawaii in Department of Defense aircraft and vessels.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Defense to take appropriate action to prevent the introduction of brown tree snakes from Guam into Hawaii via aircraft and vessels transporting personnel or cargo for the Department of Defense.

titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of Defense to take actions to prevent the inadvertent introduction of brown tree snakes from Guam to Hawaii in Department of Defense aircraft and vessels.
